r.s: Provides a wrapper to the ImageMagick library.
r.d:
Imagick is a native php extension to create and modify images using the ImageMagick API. This extension requires ImageMagick version 6.2.4+ and PHP 5.1.3+.
IMPORTANT: Version 2.x API is not compatible with earlier versions.
r.n: + Added Imagick::distortImage and Imagick::setlastiterator + Added optional fourth parameter to newImage to set the format when creating a new canvas + Fixed fitting to zero size image in Imagick::thumbnailImage + Fixed the destroy methods. + Most of the operations that read / add images to the stack move the iterator position to the last element + Fixed memleaks in methods that replace the internal MagickWand* pointer
